level.title: Process Management
level.description: Learn to monitor and control running processes

exercises.title: List All Processes
exercises.description: Use 'ps aux' to display all running processes.
hints: ps aux shows detailed process list

exercises.title: Monitor Processes Realtime
exercises.description: Use 'top' to view processes in real-time with system stats.

exercises.title: Find Process by Name
exercises.description: Use 'pgrep' to find PID of a process named 'bash'.
hints: pgrep finds process ID by name

exercises.title: Terminate a Process
exercises.description: Use 'kill' to terminate a process by PID.

exercises.title: Force Kill a Process
exercises.description: Use 'kill -9' to forcefully kill a stubborn process.
